name: Shoot The Asteros!
description:
Shoot The Asteros!

This game is a asteroid like, made with a home-made engine working in langage "C", in 1 week.

It is the first project in "C", might have some bugs (if you touch 2 asteroids in same time = crash), i will try to fix that.

Try to beat my score, i have done 9860pts, comment yours!

Good Game, and have Fun!
